Test Name: Inherited Frontotemporal Dementia and Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis (FTD/ALS) Gene Panel
Purpose: To detect pathogenic variants in genes linked to inherited frontotemporal dementia and amyotrophic lateral sclerosis using next-generation sequencing.
Container: Nuclease-free microcentrifuge tube with extracted DNA
Equipment: Illumina NextSeq 550 sequencer; NanoDrop spectrophotometer; Qubit fluorometer; Agilent BioAnalyzer
